# F  {#sec-F.unnumbered}



In this part of the book we will look at the geoms starts with letter "f" or "F".



```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
geomf <- c('geom_f')
sectionf <- c(7.1)
dff <- data.frame(geom = geomf,
                  section = sectionf)
dff |> knitr::kable() 
```
